mapper.select: SELECT T1.idx ,T1.groupId ,T2.groupName ,T1.customerKey ,T3.customerName ,T1.productCode ,T5.productName ,T1.asCompanyCode ,T1.asState ,T1.asCategory ,T1.asCode ,T1.asDetail ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.asStartDateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as asStartDateTime ,Case When ifnull(T1.asTargetDate,'') = '' Then '' Else DATE_FORMAT(T1.asTargetDate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') End asTargetDate ,ifnull(T1.asStartUserId,'') as asStartUserId ,ifnull(T4.userName,'') as asStartUserName FROM smAs T1 Left Join ofGroup T2 On T1.groupId=T2.groupId Left Join smCustomer T3 On T1.customerKey=T3.customerKey Left Join ofUser T4 On T1.asStartUserId=T4.userId Left Join adProductMaster T5 On T1.productCode=T5.productCode WHERE T1.customerKey = #{customerKey} ORDER BY asStartDateTime desc

SELECT count(*) AS TOT_COUNT FROM smAs T1 Left Join ofGroup T2 On T1.groupId=T2.groupId Left Join smCustomer T3 On T1.customerKey=T3.customerKey Left Join ofUser T4 On T1.asStartUserId=T4.userId Left Join adProductMaster T5 On T1.productCode=T5.productCode WHERE T1.asStartDateTime between concat(#{start_asDate},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{end_asDate},' 23:59:59')
AND T1.groupId = #{con_groupId}
AND T1.customerKey LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND T3.customerName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT T1.idx ,T1.customerKey ,T2.customerId ,T2.customerName ,T1.asState ,T1.as ,T1.asDateTime ,ifnull(T3.userId,'') as userId ,ifnull(T4.userName,'') as userName ,ifnull(T3.asResult,'') as asResult ,ifnull(T3.asResultDateTime,'') as asResultDateTime ,ifnull(T1.stateUpdateUserId,'') as stateUpdateUserId ,ifnull(T5.userName,'') as stateUpdateUserName ,ifnull(T1.stateUpdateDateTime,'') as stateUpdateDateTime FROM smAs T1 Left Join smCustomer T2 On T1.customerKey=T2.customerKey Left Join smAsResult T3 On T1.idx=T3.idx Left Join ofUser T4 On T3.userId=T4.userId Left Join ofUser T5 On T1.stateUpdateUserId=T5.userId Where T1.idx = #{idx}

SELECT T1.idx ,T1.userId ,T2.userName ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.asHistoryDateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as asHistoryDateTime ,T1.asHistory FROM smAsHistory T1 Left Join ofUser T2 on T1.userId=T2.userId Where T1.upidx = #{upidx} order by asHistoryDateTime desc
